message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $11,500.  I'm confident you'll find this a fair starting point for negotiations.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $10,250 for the product.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  While I'm eager to find an agreement, $10,250 is a bit too low for me.  Would you consider $11,000? I'm confident this price reflects a fair balance between value and investment.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Alice. I'll pay $10,050 for the product. This is my final offer.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  Since this is your final offer, I'll propose $10,750.  This represents a significant compromise on my part and is a very fair price for a product of this value.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'll meet you halfway at $10,375. This is my best and final offer.
